thread.title: Choice Logistics Names Matthew McKeever as President

author: cnbc.com
title: Choice Logistics Names Matthew McKeever as President
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Choice Logistics CEO Michael Katz announced today that the company has named Matthew McKeever as its president.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180206006114/en/
Matt McKeever, Choice Logistics President (Photo: Business Wire)
He will be responsible for global operations and overall service delivery to our clients. He will also assume a lead role in developing and implementing our corporate strategy and provide inspirational leadership and direction to all. Reporting to McKeever will be Jordan Kaufman, Chief Information Officer; Robb Porter, Executive Vice President of Client Services & Sales and Anne Yarmark, Executive Vice President of Human Resources & Administration.
McKeever joined Choice in 2015 as EVP, Chief Financial Officer and was promoted to EVP, Chief Operating Officer in 2016.
“Since joining Choice in July 2015, Matt has demonstrated true leadership and has exhibited the kind of vision and discipline that make him an ideal candidate for this position. His interactions with both clients and vendors have been conducted with the upmost professionalism,” Katz added.
About Choice Logistics
For more than 50 years, Choice has helped the world’s leading companies better manage their global supply-chains. We offer enterprise-grade warehouse, inventory, and transportation management solutions through our global footprint of 400 stocking locations, regional distribution centers, and transportation hubs in more than 80 countries. Beyond 3PL solutions, Choice offers field engineering, HW/SW configuration, depot repair, and asset recovery support. Companies turn to Choice to compress time-to-market, provide differentiation in the market place, and remove costs.
For more information, please visit www.choicelogistics.com , or call (800) 861-6900.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180206006114/en/
Choice Logistics
